title: Hear dust devils on Mars crackle with electricity in new NASA Perseverance rover video
description: For the first time, we can see and hear lightning-like discharges in Mars' thin atmosphere.
content: For the first time, we can see and hear lightning-like discharges in Mars' thin atmosphere.
